Name: The World Of Others
About the game: Humanity is experiencing its darkest hour. Strangers from a distant planet land on earth and want to wipe out the humans. Your wife Laura is being taken by the aliens. Find B1-12 and face the challenge of finding Laura. -Fight your enemies with up to 5 different weapons. -Collect ammunition for the weapons to be ready to fight. -Care for your injuries with medipacks to hold out. -Use your torch to keep an overview in the dark. -But make sure you always carry enough batteries. Good luck...
